settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Configure the launcher to your preferences
settings.noJavaDetected: No Java installation detected. Install Java below.
settings.allVersionsInstalled: All LTS versions are already installed.
settings.defaultMemoryNote: These values will be used by default for new instances.
settings.manageStorage: Manage space used by the launcher
settings.clickToLoadStorage: Click the tab to load storage information
settings.instancesDirectoryDesc: Choose where to store your Minecraft instances. Useful for using another drive or SSD.
settings.launcherDescription: Kaizen Launcher is a modern, open-source Minecraft launcher built with Tauri, React, and Rust. It supports Fabric, Forge, NeoForge, and Quilt modloaders, as well as Paper, Velocity servers, and more.
settings.whatsNewTruncation: Fixed instance name truncation in Schematics view
settings.whatsNewWarnings: Fixed 22 Rust compiler warnings for cleaner builds

devtools.devModeDesc: Enable developer tools and debugging features

devtools.pressToReport: Press to open bug report dialog:
devtools.bugReportIncludesDesc: Bug reports include system info, logs, and optional screenshot
devtools.reportBugDesc: Send a bug report to the development team
devtools.webhookRequiredDesc: Please configure a Discord webhook URL in Settings > DevTools to send bug reports.

discord.richPresenceDesc: Show your Minecraft activity in your Discord status

discord.showVersionDesc: Display the Minecraft version you are playing
discord.showPlaytimeDesc: Display elapsed time since you started playing
discord.rpcTestFailed: Failed to connect to Discord. Is Discord running?

discord.playerLeftDesc: When a player leaves your server
discord.backupCreatedDesc: When a world backup is created
discord.webhookTestFailed: Failed to send test message. Check your webhook URL.

cloudStorage.title: Cloud Backup
cloudStorage.description: Sync your world backups to cloud storage services
cloudStorage.providerDesc: Select the cloud storage service you want to use
cloudStorage.enabledDesc: Enable uploading backups to cloud storage
cloudStorage.autoUploadDesc: Automatically upload backups after they are created
cloudStorage.googleDriveNotConfigured: Google Drive OAuth is not available in this build.
cloudStorage.googleDriveCodeInstructions: A browser window will open. Sign in with your Google account and authorize Kaizen Launcher.
cloudStorage.dropboxNotConfigured: Dropbox OAuth is not available in this build.
cloudStorage.dropboxCodeInstructions: Click the button below to open Dropbox authorization. After approving, copy the code and paste it here.

changelog.title: Changelog
changelog.subtitle: See what's new in each version
changelog.v05RecapDesc: The v0.5.x series brought major features including skin customization, mod browsing, developer tools, cloud backups, Discord integration, P2P sharing, and significant performance improvements.

majorUpdate.title: Welcome to Kaizen v0.6!
majorUpdate.subtitle: A major update with the new Schematics Manager
majorUpdate.teamMessage: Thank you for using Kaizen Launcher! This update brings the most requested feature - a complete schematic management system. We've also made major performance improvements across the entire application. We hope you enjoy it!
majorUpdate.feature1Desc: Central library to organize all your schematics
majorUpdate.thankYou: Thank you for being part of the Kaizen community!

content.browseModsDesc: Search and install mods from Modrinth
content.browseModrinthDesc: Search and install mods, resource packs, shaders and datapacks
content.resourcePacksDesc: Customize your game's textures and visuals
content.shadersDesc: Add beautiful lighting and visual effects
content.datapacksDesc: Modify game mechanics and add new features

installButton.title: Install Button
installButton.description: Click here to install your instance. This will download Minecraft and all required files.

playButton.title: Ready to Play!
playButton.description: Installation complete! Click Play to launch your instance and start playing.

settingsTab.title: Settings
settingsTab.description: Configure RAM, Java version, and JVM arguments for this instance.

modsTab.title: Installed Mods
modsTab.description: View and manage your installed mods. Enable, disable, or delete them here.

browseTab.title: Browse Mods
browseTab.description: Search and install mods directly from Modrinth with one click.

worldsTab.title: Worlds
worldsTab.description: Manage your worlds: create backups, restore, duplicate, or delete them.

logsTab.title: Logs
logsTab.description: View game logs to debug issues. Useful for troubleshooting crashes.

configTab.title: Config Files
configTab.description: Edit configuration files directly. Modify mod settings, server properties, and more.

consoleTab.title: Console
consoleTab.description: Server console to view output and send commands in real-time.

installing.title: Installing...
installing.description: Please wait while Minecraft is being installed. This may take a few minutes.

playNow.title: Ready to Play!
playNow.description: Installation complete! Click the Play button to launch Minecraft.

java.notInstalled: Java is not installed. It is required to run Minecraft.

ram.zoneOptimal: Ideal for Vanilla and light mods
ram.zoneDanger: Too much RAM - GC freeze risk
ram.minMemoryDesc: Amount of RAM reserved at startup. Java allocates this memory immediately, which speeds up launch and prevents slowdowns when expanding memory.
ram.maxMemoryDesc: Maximum RAM limit that Minecraft can use. The game will never exceed this value. A value too high can cause freezes due to Garbage Collector.
ram.tipContent: For best performance, keep min and max close together. Always leave at least 4 GB for your operating system.

deleteInstance.title: Delete instance
deleteInstance.description: Are you sure you want to delete the instance "{name}"? This action cannot be undone.
deleteInstance.warning: This action is irreversible. All instance files will be deleted, including:
deleteInstance.typeToConfirm: To confirm, type the instance name:
deleteInstance.noMatch: Text does not match the instance name
deleteInstance.alsoDeleteShares: Also stop and delete active shares

deleteAccount.title: Delete account
deleteAccount.description: Are you sure you want to delete this account?
deleteAccount.deleteMessage: You are about to delete the account {username} from the launcher.
deleteAccount.willBeDisconnected: Will be disconnected from the launcher
deleteAccount.typeToConfirm: To confirm, type the account name:
deleteAccount.noMatch: Text does not match the account name

addAccount.title: Add account
addAccount.description: Sign in with your Microsoft account or create an offline account.
addAccount.offlineDescription: Offline mode allows you to test the launcher without a Microsoft connection. You will not be able to play on online servers.
addAccount.microsoftInstructions: Click the button below to start the login process. A window will open to sign in to Microsoft.
addAccount.microsoftPending: Microsoft login is pending approval from Microsoft. Use an offline account in the meantime.
addAccount.enterCodeOnSite: Enter this code on the Microsoft website:

tunnel.title: Tunnel configuration
tunnel.description: Expose your server to the Internet without port forwarding configuration
tunnel.boreDescription: Free TCP tunnels, no account. Perfect for Minecraft!
tunnel.ngrokDescription: TCP tunnels with account. Requires a credit card (not charged) for TCP.
tunnel.cloudflareDescription: Free quick tunnels, no account required. HTTP only (doesn't work for Minecraft).
tunnel.playitDescription: Requires a playit.gg account. Permanent URL after setup. Not available on macOS.
tunnel.enableDescription: Allows to start the tunnel manually or automatically
tunnel.autoStartDescription: Start the tunnel automatically with the server
tunnel.serverMustRun: The server must be running to start the tunnel manually.
tunnel.boreInfo: Free and open-source TCP tunnels, perfect for Minecraft. No account required. URL changes on each restart.
tunnel.ngrokInfo: TCP tunnels with free account. Requires a credit card (not charged) for TCP tunnels. URL changes on each restart.
tunnel.cloudflareInfo: HTTP only tunnels (doesn't work for Minecraft). Perfect for web servers.
tunnel.playitInfo: Permanent URLs after initial setup. Requires creating a free account on playit.gg. Not available on macOS.
tunnel.waitingClaim: Click the link below to activate your playit.gg tunnel:

serverConsole.startServerForLogs: Start the server to see logs in real-time

serverProperties.serverPortDesc: Port on which the server listens
serverProperties.motdDesc: Message displayed in the server list
serverProperties.serverIpDesc: IP address to bind to (empty = all)
serverProperties.serverRunningWarning: The server is running. Changes will be applied on the next restart.

configEditor.unableToParseVisual: Unable to parse this file. Use text mode.
configEditor.visualOnlyJson: Visual mode only supports valid JSON and TOML files.
configEditor.launchGameForConfig: Launch the game with mods to generate configuration files
configEditor.supportedFiles: Supported files: JSON, YAML, TOML, properties
configEditor.unsavedChangesDesc: You have unsaved changes. Do you want to save them before continuing?

jvmTemplates.vanillaDesc: Basic settings for vanilla Minecraft or few mods
jvmTemplates.lightModsDesc: Optimized for Fabric/Quilt with few mods (< 50 mods)
jvmTemplates.heavyModpackDesc: Optimized for Forge/NeoForge with many mods (50+ mods)
jvmTemplates.customArgs: Custom JVM arguments or select a template above
jvmTemplates.g1HeapRegion: Memory region size (increase with more RAM)
jvmTemplates.ramTipLow: With less than 2GB, avoid heavy modpacks. Default arguments are sufficient.
jvmTemplates.ramTip2to4: 2-4GB is ideal for vanilla and light mods. G1GC works well in this range.
jvmTemplates.ramTip4to8: 4-8GB is perfect for most modpacks. Increase G1HeapRegionSize for better performance.
jvmTemplates.ramTip8to12: 8-12GB: watch for long GC pauses. Use optimized settings and AlwaysPreTouch.
jvmTemplates.ramTipHigh: More than 12GB can cause GC freezes. Consider reducing RAM or use ZGC (Java 17+).

serverJvmTemplates.aikarDesc: Aikar's optimized flags - recommended for Paper/Spigot/Purpur
serverJvmTemplates.basicDesc: Basic configuration for small servers (< 10 players)
serverJvmTemplates.zgcDesc: Low latency Garbage Collector for high performance servers
serverJvmTemplates.graalvmDesc: Optimized for GraalVM with advanced JIT compilation
serverJvmTemplates.ramTipLow: Less than 2GB: sufficient for a small vanilla server with few players.
serverJvmTemplates.ramTip2to4: 2-4GB: ideal for a vanilla/Paper server with 5-15 players.
serverJvmTemplates.ramTip4to8: 4-8GB: perfect for a server with plugins and 15-30 players.
serverJvmTemplates.ramTip8to12: 8-12GB: recommended for servers with many plugins and 30-50 players.
serverJvmTemplates.ramTipHigh: More than 12GB: use Aikar 12GB+ flags to avoid GC pauses.

modrinth.tryDifferentFilters: Try changing your filters or search
modrinth.requiresFollowing: {title} requires the following {items} to work properly.

modpack.tryDifferentSearch: Try changing your filters or search
modpack.alreadyInstalled: This modpack is already installed. Select a version to create a new instance.

updater.upToDate: Kaizen Launcher is up to date
updater.devVersionDescription: This version may contain bugs or unfinished features. Only X.X.0 versions are considered stable releases.

backups.title: Backups
backups.subtitle: Manage all your world backups
backups.noBackupsDesc: Create backups from the Worlds tab in any instance
backups.restoreWarning: This will replace the existing world in the target instance.

sharing.title: Active Shares
sharing.subtitle: Manage your shared instances
sharing.noActiveSharesDescription: When you share an instance and keep it seeding, it will appear here.
sharing.stopSeedingDescription: This will stop sharing "{{name}}" with peers. They won't be able to download it from you anymore.
sharing.importDescription: Import an instance from a P2P link or local file
sharing.selectContent: Select what to include in the export:
sharing.keepOpenToSeed: Keep the app open to continue sharing with peers
sharing.keepOpenToShare: Keep the app open to continue sharing
sharing.shareLinkHelp: Paste a share link from another user
sharing.magnetLinkHelp: Paste a magnet link shared by another user
sharing.cloudflareInstallDescription: The Cloudflare agent is required for HTTPS sharing. Click below to install it automatically.
sharing.securityToken: URL is protected by a unique secret token
sharing.securityPrivate: Only share the link with trusted people
sharing.securityExpires: Link expires when you stop sharing
sharing.passwordDescription: Recipients will need this password to download the instance
sharing.passwordPrompt: This share is password protected. Enter the password to continue.
sharing.passwordRequiredForDownload: Password required to download this instance

skins.title: Skin Manager
skins.subtitle: Customize your Minecraft character
skins.addAccountFirst: Add an account to manage your skin
skins.noCapeAvailable: No capes available for this account
skins.offlineNotSupported: Skin changes not supported for offline accounts
skins.uploadDescription: Upload a custom skin image (64x64 or 64x32 PNG)
skins.applyConfirm: Apply this skin to your account?
skins.dragDrop: Drag and drop a skin image here
skins.invalidImage: Invalid image format. Please use a 64x64 or 64x32 PNG file.
skins.noFavoritesDescription: Add skins to your favorites by clicking the heart icon

serverFromClient.title: Create Server from Client
serverFromClient.description: Create a server instance from "{name}" with compatible mods
serverFromClient.pageDescription: Create a server instance from "{name}" by selecting compatible mods
serverFromClient.cardDescription: Create a server instance with the same mods, automatically filtering client-only mods
serverFromClient.betaWarning: This feature is in early beta. Some mods may not be properly detected.
serverFromClient.copyConfigsDesc: Copy mod configuration files to the server
serverFromClient.notClientInstance: This is not a client instance
serverFromClient.willBeIncludedDesc: These mods are compatible with servers and will be copied
serverFromClient.unknownModsDesc: These mods don't have Modrinth metadata. Select which ones to include.
serverFromClient.clientOnlyDesc: These mods are client-only and won't work on a server.
serverFromClient.manualModTooltip: This mod was installed manually and has no Modrinth metadata
serverFromClient.allModsCompatibleDesc: Every mod in this instance can run on a server
serverFromClient.missingDependenciesDesc: Some mods require dependencies that are excluded. This may cause the server to fail.
serverFromClient.enrichingDesc: Looking up unknown mods on Modrinth to identify their server compatibility
serverFromClient.analyzingDesc: Analyzing which mods are compatible with servers
serverFromClient.noModsEnriched: No new mods could be enriched. They may not be on Modrinth.
serverFromClient.reEnrichDesc: Try to identify unknown mods by looking them up on Modrinth
serverFromClient.dependencyWarning: {count} dependency issue(s) detected. Check the instance page for details.

modCompatibility.requiredTooltip: This mod is required on the server side and will be included automatically
modCompatibility.optionalTooltip: This mod works on servers but is not required. You can choose to include it.
modCompatibility.unsupportedTooltip: This mod is client-only and will not work on a server
modCompatibility.unknownTooltip: No metadata available for this mod. Its compatibility is unknown.

detectedIssues.title: Detected Issues
detectedIssues.description: Issues detected from analyzing your instance logs
detectedIssues.noIssues: No issues detected in the logs
detectedIssues.modNotFound: Could not find mod "{mod}" on Modrinth
detectedIssues.modNotFoundToDelete: Could not find mod "{mod}" to delete

schematics.title: Schematics
schematics.description: Manage your schematic files across all instances
schematics.selectInstance: Select an instance to view its schematics
schematics.author: Author
schematics.importDescription: Select schematic files to add to your library
schematics.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete "{name}"? This will also remove it from all instances.
schematics.copyDescription: Select the instances where you want to copy this schematic
schematics.conflictDescription: Different versions of this schematic exist in the library and instance
schematics.editTagsDescription: Add or remove tags to organize your schematics
schematics.shareDescription: Create a shareable link that others can use to download this schematic
schematics.sharePasswordPlaceholder: Enter password to protect the share
schematics.shareKeptActive: Share active - visible in Sharing page
schematics.downloadDescription: Download a schematic from a shared link
